summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 FORD FOCUS. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE ENGINE WARNING INDICATOR FLASHED AND REMAINED ILLUMINATED AS THE FAILURE PROGRESSED. THE VEHICLE JERKED AND DECELERATED TO A LOW RATE OF SPEED EACH TIME THE INDICATOR FLASHED. THE DEALER (LANDERS FORD, 2082 W POPLAR AVE, COLLIERVILLE, TN 38017, (901) 854-3600) PROVIDED A SOFTWARE UPDATE TO THE COMPUTER; HOWEVER, THE FAILURE RECURRED. THE CONTACT PLANNED ON TAKING THE VEHICLE TO A SECOND DEALER (JACK SCHMITT FORD, 1820 VANDALIA ST, COLLINSVILLE, IL 62234, (618) 477-8126) FOR FURTHER DIAGNOSTIC TESTING. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE NUMEROUS TIMES, BUT OFFERED NO ASSISTANCE. THE VIN AND FAILURE MILEAGE WERE NOT AVAILABLE.
